ModMetaData.name: [SZ]Chinese Musical Instruments Expanded 钟鸣鼎食-神州礼乐扩展
ModMetaData.author: Diamond.J,Nay,Eriewmatay,Frolg
ModMetaData.description: 一键回答常见问题：不需要任何前置Mod，不需要任何DLC，不影响游戏速度，可以中途加入，兼容所有mod（包括CE）\n如果喜欢本mod请点赞分享支持！ No pre Mod required, no DLC required, no impact on game speed, can be added midway, compatible with all mods (including CE)\nIf you like this mod, please like, share and support! Author Custom sponsorship: Eriewmatay (Jaron) Code and updates and publicity: Diamond.J Cover and texture correction: Nay Mod texture: Frolg Main content It mainly expands several sets of musical instruments, which are closely related to ritual and music culture. Among them, chime bells and guzheng have unique performance soundtracks, which are compatible with the musical instruments in the noble rooms of imperial power. As a substitute for the original drum, Shenzhou Liyue Drum has better attributes and effects. Cooperation and attention For more cooperation, please leave a message and tell me 【作者】 定制赞助：Eriewmatay（Jaron） 代码和更新及宣传：Diamond.J 封面和贴图修正：奈亚子 Mod贴图：Frolg 【主要内容】 主要扩展了几套乐器，和礼乐文化息息相关，其中编钟和古筝有独特的演奏配乐，兼容皇权的贵族房间中的乐器需求。神州礼乐鼓作为原版鼓的代替，属性和效果更佳。 【合作和关注】 我的B站账号链接请点击Mod右上角的高级-网页，欢迎大家关注，我将在b站不定期更新视频和抽奖。 想要了解更多合作请加入QQ群联系我 QQ交流群： 786428265 一群 773179016 二群 738442335 联机群
